Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Authorizes two percent of mobile sports tax revenue be used for youth team sports funding
Summary: Authorizes two percent of mobile sports tax revenue be used for youth team sports funding to be distributed by county youth bureau, city of New York's department of youth and community development, and Laureus Sport for Good Foundation USA.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to authorizing two percent of mobile sports tax revenue be used for youth team sports funding
